verses.verse: Now Joshua <WH3091> was old <WH2204> and stricken <WH935> in years; <WH8141> and the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, You are old <WH2204> and stricken <WH935> in years, <WH8141> and there remains <WH7604> yet very <WH3966> much <WH7235> land <WH776> to be possessed. <WH3423>
This <WH2063> is the land <WH776> that yet remains: <WH7604> all <WH3605> the borders <WH1552> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and all <WH3605> Geshuri, <WH1651>

From Sihor, <WH7883> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Egypt, <WH4714> even to the borders <WH1366> of Ekron <WH6138> northward, <WH6828> which is counted <WH2803> to the Canaanite: <WH3669> five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines; <WH6430> the Gazathites, <WH5841> and the Ashdothites, <WH796> the Eshkalonites, <WH832> the Gittites, <WH1663> and the Ekronites; <WH6139> also the Avites: <WH5757>

From the south, <WH8486> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> and Mearah <WH4632> that is beside the Sidonians <WH6722> to Aphek, <WH663> to the borders <WH1366> of the Amorites: <WH567>

And the land <WH776> of the Giblites, <WH1382> and all <WH3605> Lebanon, <WH3844> toward the sun rise, <WH4217> <WH8121> from Baalgad <WH1171> under <WH8478> mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768> to the entering <WH935> into Hamath. <WH2574>

All <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the hill <WH2022> country from Lebanon <WH3844> to Misrephothmaim, <WH4956> and all <WH3605> the Sidonians, <WH6722> them will I drive <WH3423> out from before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> only <WH7535> divide <WH5307> you it by lot to the Israelites <WH3478> for an inheritance, <WH5159> as I have commanded <WH6680> you.
Now <WH6258> therefore divide <WH2505> this <WH2063> land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> to the nine <WH8672> tribes, <WH7626> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519>

With whom <WH5973> the Reubenites <WH7206> and the Gadites <WH1425> have received <WH3947> their inheritance, <WH5159> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> them, beyond <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> eastward, <WH4217> even as Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> them;

From Aroer, <WH6177> that is on the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH5158> Arnon, <WH769> and the city <WH5892> that is in the middle <WH8432> of the river, <WH5158> and all <WH3605> the plain <WH4334> of Medeba <WH4311> to Dibon; <WH1769>

And all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> which <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> to the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983>

And Gilead, <WH1568> and the border <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and Maachathites, <WH4602> and all <WH3605> mount <WH2022> Hermon, <WH2768> and all <WH3605> Bashan <WH1316> to Salcah; <WH5548>

All <WH3605> the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan, <WH1316> which <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Ashtaroth <WH6252> and in Edrei, <WH154> who <WH1931> remained <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of the giants: <WH7497> for these did Moses <WH4872> smite, <WH5221> and cast <WH3423> them out.

Nevertheless the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> expelled <WH3423> not the Geshurites, <WH1651> nor <WH408> the Maachathites: <WH4602> but the Geshurites <WH1651> and the Maachathites <WH4602> dwell <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Israelites <WH3478> until <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Only <WH7535> to the tribes <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> he gave <WH5414> none <WH3808> inheritance; <WH5159> the sacrifices of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> made by fire are their inheritance, <WH5159> as he said <WH1696> to them.
And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> to the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> inheritance according to their families. <WH4940>

And their coast <WH1366> was from Aroer, <WH6177> that is on <WH5921> the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH5158> Arnon, <WH769> and the city <WH5892> that is in the middle <WH8432> of the river, <WH5158> and all <WH3605> the plain <WH4334> by Medeba; <WH4311>
Heshbon, <WH2809> and all <WH3605> her cities <WH5892> that are in the plain; <WH4334> Dibon, <WH1769> and Bamothbaal, <WH1120> and Bethbaalmeon, <WH1010>
And Jahaza, <WH3096> and Kedemoth, <WH6932> and Mephaath, <WH4158>
And Kirjathaim, <WH7156> and Sibmah, <WH7643> and Zarethshahar <WH6890> in the mount <WH2022> of the valley, <WH6010>
And Bethpeor, <WH1047> and Ashdothpisgah, <WH798> <WH6449> and Bethjeshimoth, <WH1020>

And all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the plain, <WH4334> and all <WH3605> the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> which <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> whom <WH834> Moses <WH4872> smote <WH5221> with the princes <WH5387> of Midian, <WH4080> Evi, <WH189> and Rekem, <WH7552> and Zur, <WH6698> and Hur, <WH2354> and Reba, <WH7254> which were dukes <WH5257> of Sihon, <WH5511> dwelling <WH3427> in the country. <WH776>

Balaam <WH1109> also the son <WH1121> of Beor, <WH1160> the soothsayer, <WH7080> did the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> slay <WH2026> with the sword <WH2719> among <WH413> them that were slain <WH2491> by them.

And the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> was Jordan, <WH3383> and the border <WH1366> thereof. This <WH2063> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> after their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and the villages <WH2691> thereof.
And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> inheritance to the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> even to the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to their families. <WH4940>

And their coast <WH1366> was Jazer, <WH3270> and all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Gilead, <WH1568> and half <WH2677> the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> to Aroer <WH6177> that is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Rabbah; <WH7237>
And from Heshbon <WH2809> to Ramathmizpeh, <WH7434> and Betonim; <WH993> and from Mahanaim <WH4266> to the border <WH1366> of Debir; <WH1688>

And in the valley, <WH6010> Betharam, <WH1027> and Bethnimrah, <WH1039> and Succoth, <WH5523> and Zaphon, <WH6829> the rest <WH3499> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> Jordan <WH3383> and his border, <WH1366> even to the edge <WH7097> of the sea <WH3220> of Chinnereth <WH3672> on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> eastward. <WH4217>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> after their families, <WH4940> the cities, <WH5892> and their villages. <WH2691>

And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> inheritance to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh: <WH4519> and this was the possession of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> by their families. <WH4940>

And their coast <WH1366> was from Mahanaim, <WH4266> all <WH3605> Bashan, <WH1316> all <WH3605> the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> and all <WH3605> the towns <WH2333> of Jair, <WH2971> which <WH834> are in Bashan, <WH1316> three score <WH8346> cities: <WH5892>

And half <WH2677> Gilead, <WH1568> and Ashtaroth, <WH6252> and Edrei, <WH154> cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan, <WH1316> were pertaining to the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> even to the one half <WH2677> of the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> by their families. <WH4940>

These <WH428> are the countries which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> did distribute <WH5157> for inheritance <WH5157> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab, <WH4124> on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> by Jericho, <WH3405> eastward. <WH4217>

But to the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> not any <WH3605> inheritance: <WH5159> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> was their inheritance, <WH5159> as he said <WH1696> to them.
